title: Climber on trial for leaving girlfriend to die on Austria's highest mountain
summary_full: Kerstin G's boyfriend is accused of leaving her unprotected and exhausted close to the summit during a blizzard.
summary_public: Kerstin G's boyfriend is accused of leaving her unprotected and exhausted close to the summit during a blizzard.
